name: Catcha!
description:
You have 1 minute to catch as much fruit as you can, while avoiding inedible hazards.

Was meant as a quick, couple day "test" project. As usual, a couple days turned into a couple weeks. But now, I'm done. I fear that, if I don't stop now, I'll be working on this for weeks more.

Any feedback/advice/criticism? Please do let me know. There's only one way to grow ;)

Play online: https://tic80.com/play?cart=2356
